Part 1:
	add $t0, $t0, $t0
	add $t0, $t0, $t0 #4i

	add $t0, $s0, $t0 # get addr of 4i
	lw $t1, 0($t0) # arr[i]
	lw $t2, 4($t0) # arr[i+1]

	beq $t2, $t1, firstIfEnd 
	firstIfStart
		sw $t2, 0($t0) # arr[i] = arr[i+1]
	firstIfEnd
	sw $t2, -4($t0) # arr[i-1] = arr[i+1]

Part 2:
	00000001000010000100000000100000
	00000001000010000100000000100000
	00000010000010000100000000100000
	10001101000010010000000000000000
	10001101000010100000000000000100
	00010001010010010000000000000001
	10101101000010100000000000000000
	10101101000010101111111111111100
